title: Angular - The Complete Guide Latest Features
description: Angular, a TypeScript-based framework, is ideal for client-side web apps. With its comprehensive MVC architecture, two-way data binding, dependency injection, and robust tooling, it is favored for large-scale projects, offering structure and scalability.
whatYouWillLearn: Learn modern Angular, including standalone components & Signals from the ground up in great detail
Develop modern, complex, responsive and scalable web applications with Angular
Learn TypeScript, a modern JavaScript superset, along the way
Learn how to send HTTP requests, implement routing, authenticate users or handle complete forms - and much more!
Fully understand the architecture behind an Angular application and how to use it
Create single-page or fullstack applications with one of the most modern JavaScript frameworks out there
requirements: No prior Angular knowledge is required
Basic JavaScript & web development knowledge is required

descriptionDetails.updates: The course was re-recorded with modern features like Signals, standalone components, etc.
targetAudience: Experienced frontend developers looking to enhance their skills

content.section: Angular Essentials - Components, Templates, Services & More

instructor.name: Maximilian Schwarzm√ºller
instructor.bio: Starting out at the age of 12, Maximilian never stopped learning new programming skills and languages. Passionate about web development, Python, and other programming languages, he became a successful freelance web developer and instructor.
